languages.text: The Overseer gets +10 to the stats their Pet considers Key Stats. Each time an enemy in the 4-cell radius around the Overseer is hit by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} as temporary Wounds.

traits.locale_text: Надзиратель получает бонус +10 ко всем характеристикам, которые являются ключевыми для его фамильяра. Когда противник в радиусе 4 клеток от надзирателя получает попадание, надзиратель получает {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} временного здоровья.

Надзиратель получает бонус +10 ко всем характеристикам, которые являются ключевыми для его фамильяра. Когда противник в радиусе 4 клеток от надзирателя получает попадание, надзиратель получает {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} временного здоровья.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} erhält einen Bonus von +10 auf alle Eigenschaften, die als wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} seines Vertrauten betrachtet werden. Wird ein Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Aufseher von einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g}, erhält der Aufseher {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Aufseher erhält einen Bonus von +10 auf alle Eigenschaften, die als wesentliche Eigenschaften seines Vertrauten betrachtet werden. Wird ein Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Aufseher von einem Angriff getroffen, erhält der Aufseher {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} temporäre Wunden.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} gagne un bonus de +10 à toutes les caractéristiques considérées comme des {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés de son familier. Il obtient également {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} chaque fois qu'un ennemi est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} par une attaque dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de lui.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le surveillant gagne un bonus de +10 à toutes les caractéristiques considérées comme des caractéristiques clés de son familier. Il obtient également {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} blessures temporaires chaque fois qu'un ennemi est touché par une attaque dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de lui.

languages.text: 根据使仆的关键属性，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的相应{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点。此外，每当距离监察官4格内的敌人被攻击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，监察官都会获得{uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}点临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 根据使仆的关键属性，监察官的相应属性提高10点。此外，每当距离监察官4格内的敌人被攻击命中时，监察官都会获得{uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}点临时生命值。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} obtiene una bonificación +10 a todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} que se consideran características clave para el familiar. Cuando un enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del supervisor recibe el {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de un ataque, el supervisor obtiene {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El supervisor obtiene una bonificación +10 a todas las características que se consideran características clave para el familiar. Cuando un enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del supervisor recibe el impacto de un ataque, el supervisor obtiene {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} heridas temporales.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}はそのファミリアーの主要な特性とみなされるすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に+10のボーナスを付与される。監督官の半径4セル以内の敵が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}を受けると、監督官は{uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}が付与される。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官はそのファミリアーの主要な特性とみなされるすべての特性に+10のボーナスを付与される。監督官の半径4セル以内の敵が攻撃を受けると、監督官は{uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743}一時的な傷が付与される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, iyesinin kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} kabul edilen niteliklerine +10 bonus kazanır. Gözetmen'in etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir düşmana bir saldırı ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} Gözetmen, {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} gains a +10 bonus to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} considered to be their familiar's key characteristics. Whenever an enemy within a 4-cell radius around the Overseer is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by an attack, the Overseer gains {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, iyesinin kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} kabul edilen niteliklerine +10 bonus kazanır. Gözetmen'in etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir düşmana bir saldırı ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulduğunda{/g} Gözetmen, {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/G}, iyesinin kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} kabul edilen niteliklerine +10 bonus kazanır. Gözetmen'in etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan bir düşmana bir saldırı ile vurulduğunda Gözetmen, {uip|StatBonus|5e29fedc5a7e4a209d58d4bd75f94743} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.
